text: What do people use for including Julia code (preferably with syntax highlighting) into a LaTeX document?

elements.text: What do people use for including Julia code (preferably with syntax highlighting) into a LaTeX document?

text: I've always just used the `listings` package, `lstlisting` environment with a script adapted from this <https://tex.stackexchange.com/a/212794>
